X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=38619325

Hi

I'm presently extending webtest [1] to test applets in the context of 
=
an html browsing session: I use webtest to navigate through the web app 
up=
 to a page containing an applet, then have webtest launch the applet 
and t=
est it with a jemmy [2] scenario. Once the applet / the test 
scenario comp=
letes, webtest can proceed with further test of the web 
app.

Give it a tr=
y, any recent build of webtest contains the necessary 
support, even though=
 it is not yet documented ;-(
I'll be glad for any feedback!

Happy testing=

	dna


[1] <http://webtest.canoo.com>
[2] <http://jemmy.netbeans.org/>


O=
